An interface for confidentiality modes to implement This could become deprecated at some point.  Copyright © 2007 Henri Torgemane

ICipher
CBC confidentiality mode.
Note: The constructor accepts an optional padding argument, but ignores it otherwise.
This is the “full” CFB.
